Has anyone else really confirmed that this update will mess up a pirated copy of 2.1?

I took a leap of faith and gave this a shot.
The result: IT WORKS!
Run the 'Superior Installer' and follow the instructions and then run the 'patch'. Click the "Patch" button and locate your VST folder (usually under C:/ > Program Files > VST Plugins). Highlight the folder and click OK. 
Easy as pie. Thanks for the upload.
